meanings.definition: A group of six people or things.
meanings.sent1: At the party, we split into two sextets to play a game.
meanings.sent2: The classroom had two sextets of students working on different projects.
meanings.sent3: The sextets of colorful balloons made the room look festive.
meanings.sent4: The sextets of stars in the sky twinkled brightly on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The sextets of flowers in the garden created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: A musical composition for six voices or instruments.
meanings.sent1: The choir performed a lovely piece with intricate sextets.
meanings.sent2: The orchestra rehearsed a challenging sextet for the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent3: The sextets of notes danced together in harmony, creating a melodious tune.
meanings.sent4: The sextets of instruments blended seamlessly, filling the hall with music.
meanings.sent5: The sextets of voices sang in perfect unison, captivating the audience.
